prog03

Class AnimationApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • prog03.AnimationApp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, ApplicationConstants

    public class AnimationApp
extends processing.core.PApplet
implements ApplicationConstants
    This is a version of the animation project that uses inheritance (both the Box and Ellipse classes derive from GraphicObject).
    Author:
    jyh and Paige Courtemanche

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int ANIMATION_TO_RENDERING_RATIO

      Index for calls to the draw() callback function

      Variable keeping track of the last time the update method was invoked.

      List storing references to all graphic objects in the app.

      Integer keeping track of the player's score Cannot go below zero

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Callback function that displays the scene.
      void keyReleased()
      This function deletes all selected objects when the 'A' key is pressed The 'delete' key is not used because professor Herve said that the delete key would not work on my mac
      static void main(java.lang.String[] passedArgs) 
      void mouseReleased()
      Function that finds the location where the mouse click was released The score and object both change depending on the click
      float[] pixelToWorld(int ix, int iy)
      Converts pixel coordinates to world coordinates.
      void settings()
      First instance method invoked by Processing.
      void setup()
      Second method invoked by processing.
      void update()
      This method is used for animation (update the sate of the various objects in the world (whether visible or not).
      int[] worldToPixel(float x, float y)
      Converts world coordinates into pixel coordinates.

    • Field Detail

      • lastUpdateTime

        int lastUpdateTime
        Variable keeping track of the last time the update method was invoked. The different between current time and last time is sent to the update method of each object.

      • objectList_

        private java.util.ArrayList<GraphicObject> objectList_
        List storing references to all graphic objects in the app.

        int frameCount
        Index for calls to the draw() callback function

        public float[] pixelToWorld(int ix,

        Converts pixel coordinates to world coordinates. Used e.g. to place the location of a mouse click in the world.

        iy - pixel coordinate along the y axis
